meanings.english_definition: Having been made lawful or legitimate; authorized or sanctioned.
examples: Il governo è stato legittimato dalle elezioni. (The government was legitimized by the elections.)
L'uso di questa pratica è stato legittimato dalla legge. (The use of this practice has been legitimized by the law.)
meanings.usage_notes: Often used to describe something that was previously considered unlawful or questionable but has now been given legal or moral approval.

level_frequency.notes: Common in formal contexts and legal/political discussions.
